root.name: Manders
root.description: This plugin computes the Manders coefficients between ROIs in 2 sequences (Intensity and surface coefficients). A p value (probability of signal colocalization) is also computed with pixel scrambling.
root.author: lagache - Thibault Lagache
root.changelog:
- Version 0.0.1.3 Date 2015-01-23 13:44:16
- Version 0.0.1.2 Date 2014-10-03 12:07:26
Additional excel outputs (total/mean and variance of colocalized signal)
- Version 0.0.1.1 Date 2014-09-02 16:01:25
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2014-09-01 15:45:57
